          <title>
            <string language="en">Living things and the senses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lebende Sachen und die Richtungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Choses vivantes et les sens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coisas vivas e os sentidos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cose viventi ed i sensi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πράγματα διαβίωσης και οι αισθήσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cosas vivas y los sentidos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the ability of living things such as humans and animals to use the senses. The girl and her dog can see, hear, feel and smell things around them.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Animals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">feeling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Hearing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">humans</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">life processes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">living things</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">seeing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">senses</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">smelling</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Fähigkeit der lebenden
Sachen wie Menschen und Tiere, die Richtungen zu verwenden. Das 
Mädchen und ihr Hund können Sachen um sie sehen, hören, glauben und
riechen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la capacité des choses
vivantes telles que des humains et des animaux d'utiliser les sens. 
La fille et son chien peuvent voir, entendre, sentir et sentir 
des choses autour d'elles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a abilidade de coisas 
vivas tais como seres humanos e animais de usar os sentidos. A 
menina e seu cão podem ver, ouvir, sentir e cheirar coisas em torno 
delas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la capacità delle 
cose viventi quali gli esseri umani e gli animali di usare i sensi. 
La ragazza ed il suo cane possono vedere, sentire, ritenere e 
sentire l'odore delle cose intorno loro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη δυνατότητα των 
πραγμάτων διαβίωσης όπως οι άνθρωποι και τα ζώα για να 
χρησιμοποιήσει τις αισθήσεις. Το κορίτσι και το σκυλί της 
μπορούν να δουν, να ακούσουν, να αισθανθούν και να 
μυρίσουν τα πράγματα γύρω από τα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la capacidad de cosas 
vivas tales como seres humanos y animales de utilizar los sentidos. 
La muchacha y su perro pueden ver, oír, sentir y oler cosas 
alrededor de ellas.</string>
          </description>
